titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1578) to amend the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to provide for the expedited consideration of certain proposed rescissions of budget authority.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1578 (amending the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 regarding rescissions of budget authority).
